title: The Guardian's Panic

panel_structure.description: Knight in full armor (representing ego) standing guard at castle gates as psychedelic waves approach—reality beginning to melt around the edges
Knight's armor melting under consciousness expansion, desperately throwing keys into void while shouting 'I WAS NEVER TRAINED FOR THIS!'—medieval meets DMT aesthetic

transformation_notes: The medieval knight becomes a perfect metaphor for how our ego-guardian, trained only for ordinary reality, panics hilariously when confronted with consciousness states it was never designed to handle.
